required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety of NovoMix® 30 or Levemir® for Treatment of Type 2 Diabetics in Macedonia
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Multicentre, Open Label, Non-controlled, Observational, 26-week Study in Patients Using NovoMix® 30 (Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30) or Levemir® (Insulin Detemir) for Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus in Macedonia

brief_summary.textblock: This study is conducted in Europe. The aim of this observational study is to investigate the incidence of serious adverse drug reactions when using NovoMix® 30 (biphasic insulin aspart 30) or Levemir® (insulin detemir) for treatment of type 2 diabetes mellitus under normal clinical practice conditions in Macedonia.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of serious adverse drug reactions (SADRs)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of all minor hypoglycaemic events
Number of all major hypoglycaemic events
Percentage of subjects to reach HbA1c below 7.0%
The effect on glycaemic control as measured by FPG (fasting plasma glucose)
The effect on glycamic control as measured by PG profile

intervention.description: Safety and effectiveness data collection in connection with the use of the drug.
Safety and effectiveness data collection in connection with the use of the drug in daily clinical practice.

study_pop.textblock: Patients from speciality practice settings who have been deemed appropriate to receive biphasic insulin aspart 30 or insulin detemir as new treatment and as part of routine out-patient care by the prescribing physician.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- After the physician decision has been made to use biphasic insulin aspart 30 or insulin detemir therapy, any subject with Type 2 diabetes is eligible for the study, including newly-diagnosed subjects who have never received insulin or an insulin analogue before.Particular attention should be paid to the drug interactions that are listed within the product label
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who are unlikely to comply with protocol, e.g., uncooperative attitude, inability to return for the final visit
- Subjects currently being treated with biphasic insulin aspart 30 or insulin detemir
- Subjects who were previously enrolled in this study
- Subjects with a hypersensitivity to biphasic insulin aspart 30 or insulin detemir or to any of the excipients
- Women who are pregnant, breast feeding or have the intention of becoming pregnant within next 6 months

address.country: Macedonia, The Former Yugoslav Republic of

location_countries.country: Macedonia, The Former Yugoslav Republic of

intervention_browse.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart, insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
